item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, January 28, 2025 at 5:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. We're bringing Pebble back (1540 points | 373 comments)
2. Machine Learning in Production (CMU Course) (143 points | 15 comments)
3. Why OpenAI's $157B valuation misreads AI's future (Oct 2024) (80 points | 49 comments)
4. Google open-sources the Pebble OS (892 points | 131 comments)
5. How we scaled Slack to support 1000s of developers (75 points | 18 comments)
6. The Taylorator – All Your Frequencies Are Belong to Us (253 points | 81 comments)
7. Turning the Database Inside-Out (12 points | 3 comments)
8. The Alpha Myth: How captive wolves led us astray (184 points | 160 comments)
9. Using AI for Coding: My Journey with Cline and LLMs (124 points | 48 comments)
10. The Vikings also used crampons to avoid slipping on ice (14 points | 8 comments)
11. DeepSeek releases Janus Pro, a text-to-image generator [pdf] (689 points | 533 comments)
12. Go 1.24's go tool is one of the best additions to the ecosystem in years (165 points | 66 comments)
13. The Illustrated DeepSeek-R1 (195 points | 32 comments)
14. Dragonsweeper — A minesweeper game that requires observation (68 points | 32 comments)
15. Complexity physics finds crucial tipping points in chess games (31 points | 9 comments)
16. My failed attempt to shrink all NPM packages by 5% (305 points | 203 comments)
17. The ocean teems with networks of interconnected bacteria (100 points | 17 comments)
18. Facebook ban on discussing Linux? (512 points | 252 comments)
19. Oliver Heaviside and the theory of transmission lines (2021) (235 points | 70 comments)
20. Nvidia’s $589B DeepSeek rout (327 points | 681 comments)
21. Show HN: I Made an iOS Podcast Player with Racket (185 points | 64 comments)
22. A 20-Year-Old Small Company (18 points | 9 comments)
23. Bilinear down/upsampling, aligning pixel grids, and that infamous GPU half pixel (2021) (108 points | 15 comments)
24. Show HN: I Created ErisForge, a Python Library for Abliteration of LLMs (108 points | 42 comments)
25. A Faster Quantum Fourier Transform (62 points | 4 comments)
26. Operation Leg – a pilot unlike any other (2020) (164 points | 71 comments)
27. I trusted an LLM, now I'm on day 4 of an afternoon project (206 points | 153 comments)
28. SiFive's P550 Microarchitecture (144 points | 52 comments)
29. The Curious Case of Quentell (71 points | 5 comments)
30. Mineral Oil Cooled PC (2014) (58 points | 50 comments)
